name: 劉建宏
objective: 本課程目標旨在介紹學生軟體工程的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。學生將會學習，開發一個高品質軟體所需要的軟體工程原理、觀念、方法、技術、與步驟。本課程將介紹下列主題：專案流程、專案管理與規劃、.系統需求分析、系統設計方法、系統測試與驗證、系統維護方法等。
schedule:
週次              單元主題
1                 Introduction
2                 Socio-technical systems
3                 Critical systems
4                 Software processes
5                 Project management
6                 Software requirements
7                 Requirement engineering process
8                 System models
9                 Midterm Exam
10                Architectural design
11                Application architecture
12                Object-oriented design
13                Rapid software development
14                Verification and validation
15                Process improvement
16                Configuration management
17                Project Presentation
18                Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. Homework and Attendances (15%)
2. Exams
a. Midterm (25%)
b. Final (25%)
3. Project (35%)
materials:
Textbook:
Software Engineering, 8th Edition, Ian Sommerville, Addison Wesley, 2007.
Reference Books:
Software Engineering: A Practitioner's Approach, 6th Edition, Roger S. Pressman, McGraw-Hill, 2004.
